state_analysis: Both data files are now cleaned: clean_users.csv (30 valid users) and valid_transactions.json (100 valid transactions). Now I need to import this data into the PostgreSQL database. First, I need to fix the PostgreSQL authentication issue.
explanation: I'll switch to using the postgres system user to access the database, then import the cleaned data into the tables.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;'"
su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c \"COPY users(user_id, username, email, created_at, status) FROM '/backup/clean_users.csv' WITH (FORMAT csv, HEADER true);\""
su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;'"
